overview: Showtime presents "Cugine Viziose", starring Angie Larousse, Deborah Wells, Katy McKay and Simona Valli. This classic Italian film features a woman, Simona Valli, who's desperate to let loose her inner desires. She befriends Deborah who is more than willing to show her the ropes. After a few days spent with Deborah, Simona becomes the beautiful nymph she's always wanted to be.
title: Hot Cousins
